trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around February 8th 1997
divs: sighting detailswe was just coming from seing a movie, me and my roommate. i was driving and he was napping in the passenger side. the time was approximately a little after 2am. i usually take the same route home everytime i go to this particular theater but for some reason i missed (the main road) to take us home and i had to make a uturn to get back on track, thats when i see lights that at first looked like a typical commercial airliner but when it came in closer i clearly seen it was something totally different beyond belief!! the road i needed turn down to go home was about 2 blocks away but my eyes was glued to the object, which i was able to take'em off of it for a few seconds to see did my sudden stop of the vehicle awake my roommate but it did not and a matter-of-fact, i had to nudge him a few times which wasn't very effective either and by no means, i was not gonna miss this!! the object flew down and stopped right over some trees and power towers. as it was coming to a stop, something about it startled me, the shape of it was in a perfect triangle and it shined with a glowy semi-bright orangey light but when it stopped it flipped right side up into a pyramid shape right over the power towers and trees. i was wowwwwd!!! i should mention i heard no sounds of an aircraft engine or any type of engine for that matter just "airbursts". what was even more amazing was we was'nt that far away from the airport and macdill airforce base, right in between the two so i just knew it was being detected or radarred or something you would think huh? then it happened, from beneath the power lines what seemed to be below the ground, something that might be described as an orb? it was a ultra-violet\purple looking round transparent sphere with what appeared to be lightning bolts inside it. i immediately took it as some type of power source for fuel because as that was happening a strange sound occurred like a generator it kind of vacuumed the orb up in absorbed it into the object which it brightened up then and it repeated this process three more times before it got as bright as the sun like you can literally see the night turn day then took off like the starship enterprise.
